nodes.title:
Sunisa Lee became the fifth consecutive American woman to win the title of best all-around gymnast in the world on Thursday.

Her #Tokyo2020 victory resonated back home in Minnesota, particularly with its Hmong American community, in which she was raised. https://t.co/SQNnic1P9d https://t.co/xfZxD38G6V

nodes.title:
"The hot, shirtless Tongan flagbearer from Rio is BACK!"

Pita Taufatofua became an overnight sensation five years ago when he marched shirtless and in a traditional Tongan outfit at the opening ceremonies in 2016 and 2018. He is back for #Tokyo2020. https://t.co/lSzzr8Lsf4 https://t.co/bT2HlMoKhO
